original_text: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses, let us lay aside every weight, and the sin which doth so easily beset us, and let us run with patience the race that is set before us,
korean_text: 이러므로 우리에게 구름 같이 둘러싼 허다한 증인들이 있으니 모든 무거운 것과 얽매이기 쉬운 죄를 벗어 버리고 인내로써 우리 앞에 당한 경주를 하며

sentences.original_text: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about
with so great a cloud of witnesses
let us lay aside every weight
and the sin which doth so easily beset us
and let us run with patience
the race that is set before us
